position: Human Resources Executive | Associate CIPD | Talent Acquisition | Employee Engagement

experience.title: Human Capital Executive at 6thStreet.com
experience.description: Optimized the recruitment process to a 45-day cycle by effectively utilizing ATS, targeting a wide range of departments including Product, Technology, Finance, Data, Creative, Marketing, Customer Service, and Buying & Merchandising.Crafted and posted detailed job descriptions across various platforms, ensuring a wide visibility and attracting the right talent.Streamlined new employee onboarding for a smooth transition into organizational culture and workflows.Spearheaded employee engagement programs, enhancing company morale through team-building, feedback mechanisms, and wellness initiatives.Managed comprehensive HRIS data for both current and past employees, ensuring accurate records and data integrity.Employed advanced sourcing techniques, leveraging LinkedIn Recruiter, Naukri Gulf, and other digital platforms to tap into diverse talent pools.Efficiently handled the exit process for employees, overseeing terminations, resignations, and contract non-renewals.
experience.description_html: Optimized the recruitment process to a 45-day cycle by effectively utilizing ATS, targeting a wide range of departments including Product, Technology, Finance, Data, Creative, Marketing, Customer Service, and Buying & Merchandising.Crafted and posted detailed job descriptions across various platforms, ensuring a wide visibility and attracting the right talent.Streamlined new employee onboarding for a smooth transition into organizational culture and workflows.Spearheaded employee engagement programs, enhancing company morale through team-building, feedback mechanisms, and wellness initiatives.Managed comprehensive HRIS data for both current and past employees, ensuring accurate records and data integrity.Employed advanced sourcing techniques, leveraging LinkedIn Recruiter, Naukri Gulf, and other digital platforms to tap into diverse talent pools.Efficiently handled the exit process for employees, overseeing terminations, resignations, and contract non-renewals.
